title: Skin Boost in Aram?
body:
Hi,

Recently I've started to play ARAM again, so I've noticed a button named "skin boost" for 75rp (i think) it says it gives you and your team mates a skin for the champion they are playing right now, so do me and my teammates get to keep the skin after the ARAM game has ended? or does the skin only last for that one game only?
Thanks

replies.body: I'm pretty sure it says something along the lines of "you unlock a skin to use for a single game" in the description.
